Text: it doesnt play at emulator SickPandaZero do you know why?????????????????

@psykostas1990: This is for PSP, you have to download the original iso/bin-cue for playing with emulators like ePSXe.

@ SPZ: Downloading, i'll be back and tell u how it went. Thanks for the share!

Update: I am playing it right now on my PSP3000 with LCFW v6.60 LME-1.5 by Neur0n, thanks!

INSTRUCTIONS:
 - Copy this folder ("Bloody Roar 2") to the 'PSP/GAME' directory in your Memory Stick.
 - In the PSP menu (XMB) go to 'Game/Memory Stick', search and then press (X) to start the game*.
 - For cahnging image size press the [PS] key and go to 'Other Settings' and then 'Screen Mode'.
 * You will need a Custom Firmware (CFW) or a Light CFW (LCFW) to be able to play this game.
